description: This Flutter Dart source file defines a dashboard screen widget that displays upcoming consultations and recent records in a healthcare management app. It includes state initialization, data fetching using providers, and UI layout with responsiveness.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the user dashboard displaying upcoming consultations and recent records.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: State class managing data fetching and UI building for DashboardScreen.

classes.name: _ConsultationsList
classes.description: Stateless widget displaying a list of upcoming consultations.

classes.name: _RecordsList
classes.description: Stateless widget displaying a list of recent records.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state and triggers data fetching after first frame rendering.

methods.name: _safeFetchProfile
methods.description: Asynchronous helper to fetch user profile safely, handling exceptions within fetchProfile.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the responsive layout for the dashboard screen, displaying consultations and records.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the list of consultation items.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the list of record items.
